author: Thomas Ricker
title: Bill Gates is now the leading target for coronavirus conspiracies, says report
description: Conspiracy theories linking Bill Gates with the coronavirus were mentioned 1.2 million times on TV and social media from February to April, 33 percent more often than the 2nd most popular conspiracy theory linking 5G with COVID-19, according to Zignal Labs, p…
content:
Lies about Gates outpace 5G and COVID-19 conspiracies
Bill Gates in 2019 when things were simpler.
Photo by Mike Cohen/Getty Images for The New York Times
Bill Gates is now the favorite target for coronavirus misinformation according to data compiled by th… [+2029 chars]
